thebabycareproject

Class NutrimentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • thebabycareproject.NutrimentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class NutrimentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller of the section ' Nutriment ' of the ' Food & Nutrition ' category. Has a subsection named ' Diet Chart '. Contains restrictions and special care(if needed) about feeding child according to the child's age and gender. Restrictions and special care are loaded as images according to age and gender, images are created in PowerPoint. There is a titled pane on top to change the diet chart, restrictions and special care according to age, gender and nutritious status(or weight status). Gender and age in the titled pane are pre-selected from the user's input of child's birthday and gender in database, but it can be changed.
